WorkItem.ClosedComment: with no further diagnostic information, we'll close this
WorkItem.Description: If I encode any file to any format using your encoder in the wpf sample on win8x64 prof. it fails. If I play the file there is just a strange noise. And on some targetformats there is an Exceptoin in MediaFoundationEncoder::PerformEncoder in line writer.BeginWriting();
WorkItem.Summary: Whole MF Encoder does not work

Comments.Message: That's odd, because I developed it in Win8 x64. Can you give an example of a format you tried to encode to? What was the input file? And what is the exception you get in BeginWriting?

I've done a few quick tests running as an x64 process (the WPF demo runs by default as x86) and encoding is working fine for me. I do need more information if you want me to attempt to fix your problem. Otherwise I'll close the issue.
